Recology

An exploration of using R for ecology, evolution, and open science.

Recology

Recology is based on the Jekyll template designed, written and built by Joe Fiorini.

Tools

  • Custom designed using Keynote, Photoshop and Mobilicious People Icons.
  • Powered by Jekyll
  • All code built by hand using Vim
  • Headings are Helvetica and paragraph text is Tisa Web Pro from TypeKit
  • Code snippets colored by Pygments using the manni theme
  • Writing done on Mac using Scrivener and on the iPhone/iPad in Notesy and Nebulous Notes (synced via Dropbox)
